text: Gresso was a municipality of the district Locarno in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. == History == The municipality was made in 1882 by splitting from the municipality of Vergeletto. On 10 April 2016, the former municipalities of Gresso, Isorno, Mosogno and Vergeletto merged to form the municipality of Onsernone.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 27 April 2016 == References == == Other websites == Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:2016 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Gresso
